headline.main: FOE'S ALEUTIAN BASES POUNDED IN U.S. RAIDS; Bomber Lost in One of Attacks on Kiska and Attu

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 1 -- Though conclusive reports from the Navy on the recent engagement between Japanese and American warships in the Aleutians still are lacking, a Navy communique revealed today that Army bombers and fighters were continuing to pound the enemy bases in that area.
